1110001100100011 0101100100000100 1 -> sum: 0011110000101000, cout: 1

0000011100100011 0011000001100001 1 -> sum: 0011011110000101, cout: 0

0011010100100100 0101100101100000 0 -> sum: 1000111010000100, cout: 0
